title: The Drive home
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, Dennis Tupicoff and Annette Trevitt
brief_description: This 2D hand-drawn animation takes us on a journey through city streets during peak-hour. The distraction of talk-back radio frustrates a lone woman driver when bad reception draws her attention to the road again.
creator_credit_for_label: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, Dennis Tupicoff and Annette Trevitt
